Texts.Eng:
Cosmic-attuned bunny-folk from a distant world of fantasy. Skilled fencers, archers, and spellcasters.

Diet: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
+^green;20^reset;% Energy, +^green;12^reset;% Speed
+^green;30^reset;% Cosmic Resist
Immune: Slime
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
+^green;10^reset;% Health, +^green;15^reset;% Energy, +^green;19^reset;% Speed In Rainforest, Forest and Primeval biomes
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Wands and Staves: +^green;15^reset;% Damage and Energy
Bows: +^green;15^reset;% Damage and Energy
Rapier(one): +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;1 Protection (Rapier +^green; Dagger) +^green;2^reset;% Crit and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resistance
Rapier, Shortsword and Dagger: +^green;15^reset;% Physical Resist, +^green;12^reset;% Damage, has a ^green;5^reset;% chance to shoot mystic blasts during combos.
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
-^red;30^reset;% Shadow resist,
-^red;20^reset;% Max Food, Health
